title: 91x23: General Discussion of the Honoraria Ban and Compensation for Writing Books
summary:
OGE provides a general overview of the honoraria ban and its effect on employees who may wish to write books.  

Notes: [Note: The honoraria ban was held unconstitutional by the U.S. Supreme Court in U.S. v. National Treasury Employees Union, 513 U.S. 454 (1995).]
